Description

Ernest (iFire) Lee is a Canadian developer specializing in game engine technology, with a focus on the Godot Engine. As a core contributor, he leads the development of Godot's glTF 3D import/export pipeline and collaborates with OMIGROUP to enhance metaverse interoperability, notably through the V-Sekai group's VRM avatar importer.

History

Khronos Group | 3D Formats Contributor (glTF/VRM Standards) | 2023–Present

V-Sekai Social VR | 2021 - present

Godot Engine | Core 3D Pipeline Coordinator (Animation/Import Systems) | 2017–Present
